AzureBlade's spark:
Skullgrin... Hear me out... The way you have fought all of your 
life... Blind destruction... That very way is the reason your powers 
have not reached their full extent... Learn to control yourself... To 
fight for a just cause... If you can master yourself, then you can 
find true power! Hold on to me, Skullgrin...
He gave some energy to Skullgrin, enough to wake him up, but not 
enough yet to fight.
